TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program Fanfics - Need help!

Articles.Content:
Herro Kerbal Space Forums, I require your help with writing a story. I've got a few ? for you guys.

1: What kind of qualifications do you need to become an astronaut/cosmonaut/taikonaut/kerbonaut?

2: Are all of the kerbonauts part of the Kerman family, or are there Kermstrongs, Kermon, Ker-somethings in training/flying rockets into Kerbin?

3: How well are multi-part stories taken here on KSPF? Are they seen as spam, or as ingenious?

Thank ye for ye time!

Hi Nymus.

1: Any qualifications you want for your story, you can make it serious, or humorous, it's your story so it's up to you

2: Currently Kerman is the only surname in KSP but that doesn't mean you can't come up with others, and there is no rule that they need to start with K

3: Multi-part stories are fine, just don't keep us waiting too long for the next installment

4: Have fun writing, that's the most important thing
